subject: Add fill layout with samples button for multi-image layouts
body:
- Modified loadSampleImage to support filling empty cells without replacing existing images
- Added "Fill layout with samples" button when library is empty (shows image count for multi-image layouts)
- Added "Fill X empty cells with samples" link when some image cells are unassigned
- Changed label from "Or try a sample" to "Or pick a sample" for clarity

https://claude.ai/code/session_01MjuTGP4b61W9NrBeqx5DeN
title: Add fill layout with samples button for multi-image layouts
